content: Trying it and getting a 404 on https://fhirsandbox1.tsysinteropsvcs.net:8100/r4/sites/123/Encounter?patient=1
Hi Michele, I'm trying to find Chuck to help you. I'm getting 404 also.
Yes, but it is getting the data for that patient that fails
(eg the Encounter in the link above)
Thanks for testing it @Michele Mottini . The issue is fixed and it is working now.
